user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
reflect_result: By typing in the content "razer nari" in the search bar, you have initiated the search query for the product on Amazon. This is a crucial step toward fulfilling the user request, as now the search results will display items related to "razer nari." This will allow you to select the first entry, which you can then add to the shopping cart. Therefore, this action has made progress toward completing the user request.
